QUESTIONS

Property

Frequently Asked
Questions

1

I Want to use you but another agent has quoted me a cheaper fee. What shall I do?


You may find a cheaper fee elsewhere, but we believe we are offering a better service and better value than any of our competitors. We are currently rated in the top 10 of all agents in the UK for customer service on www.allAgents.co.uk and in 2016 won the award for Best Small Chain in the UK. Our fee also includes professional photography and floorplan as standard.

1

I Want to use you but another agent has quoted me a cheaper fee. What shall I do?

You may find a cheaper fee elsewhere, but we believe we are offering a better service and better value than any of our competitors. We are currently rated in the top 10 of all agents in the UK for customer service on www.allAgents.co.uk and in 2016 won the award for Best Small Chain in the UK. Our fee also includes professional photography and floorplan as standard.

2

I Want to sell but I was expecting higher valuations. What are the options?


Valuations are subjective, they’re not an exact science, and so it is natural that opinions will differ. When valuing, our job is to give you an evidence-based estimate of the valuation range but if you want your property marketed at above, or below, our valuation range you just need to tell us - you’re the boss!

2
